backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Defines a feature evidence report describing UI copyright removal changes and related files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short descriptions of all major frontend components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS defining color variables, dark mode theming, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up metadata, fonts, and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing the prompt, reveal state, layout, and section rendering for the Valentine experience.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Closin: Closing section with hearts, a gratitude message, and buttons to scroll to top or replay the experience.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FirstE: Initial full‑screen prompt asking “Do you love me?” with an evasive No button and animated hearts.
frontend/src/components/valentine/games/: Multiple‑choice love quiz with scoring, animated feedback, and a results screen with restart support.
Icon‑based memory match game that shuffles pairs, tracks moves, checks matches, and displays a win screen.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeroSe: Hero section with background image, animated hearts, headline text, and a button to scroll to the message section.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Messag: Displays the personalized love letter with a dimmed background image and styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/valentine/PlaySe: Game section toggling between memory match and love quiz games with themed UI.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Fixed top navigation bar enabling smooth scrolling between sections and replaying the surprise.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Surpri: Full‑screen animated heart reveal screen that fades out and triggers onReveal after a short delay.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Layout wrapper that centers content and optionally renders a repeating Valentine-themed background pattern.
frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts: Static configuration storing Valentine messages, headings, and personalized text content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom Valentine-themed color variables and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, InternetIdentityProvider, React Query, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, colors, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project's metadata, features, and pending requests related to removing copyright text.
